title: Reconnecting although strong internet
body: So this keeps happening in every game I play. My internet is fine, I can play any other game and go on internet etc. However when I play League, all through the game, I get the "Attempting to reconnect" sign although my internet is up and running. This didn't used to happen and it's frustrating since I CANT PLAY. Appreciate all the help I can get.

replies.body: Even though your internet is strong, you can still experience issues specifically connecting to the game server.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your network and make sure everything is configured to establish those comms.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to make sure your firewall settings are set correctly!  Let me know if you have any questions.
It's the clients fault, stop telling us it's our internet. Fix your damn game Riot and stop sending us these noob supports with some copy pasted answers.
